title: PUBLIC 1 PUBLIC PROCEEDINGS OF THE
snippet: The Governor for Austria, Mr Magnus Brunner, was the Chair of the Board of Governors. The · Governor for Georgia, Mr Lasha Khutsishvili, and the Governor for Jordan, Ms Zeina Toukan ... Ms Odile Renaud-Basso, President of the EBRD.

title: 2020 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD's Board of Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso as President to succeed Sir Suma Chakrabarti in October 2020.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso is the current President of the Bank. The President manages the work of the Bank under the guidance of the Board of Directors.

title: Annual Meeting 2024 Proceedings
snippet: Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso to serve a second four-year term as President of the EBRD. The Board reviewed the Bank’s current Strategic and Capital Framework and Governors gave guidance for the preparation of the next Framework, due ...

title: 2024 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD Board of Governors re-elected Odile Renaud-Basso to serve a second term as the Bank’s President on 16 May 2024.
